content: there s really nothing better than a cozy and stylish pair of slipper socks using two colors of vintage dk these socks are worked from the toe up and feature a clever color work pattern finished measurements foot circumference 7½ 8 8¾ foot length 9 10 11 adjustable yarn berroco vintage dk 100 grs 1 ball each #2185 tide pool mc and #2116 dove cc needles and notions two 16 circular needles each sizes 2 2 75 mm and 4 3 5 mm or size to obtain gauge stitch markers waste yarn to hold heel sts tapestry needle gauge 24 sts and 32 row = 4 in st st on larger needles
